channel.title: Probably may of been suggested before: Linux Award?
channel.description:
Well, looking at the Linux discussion, I thought there could be a Linux Guru award?
I mean there's an award for everything on this forum, from Java Guru to breakfast. I reckon we should have one, because there's a few people that deserve it. Oh well, toss your ideas around.

item.title: Probably may of been suggested before: Linux Award?
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Lol… I think I was using a computer that has moparisthebest blocked, so it was hard to read the text. Otherwise I wouldn’t have made that mistake.

Read full topic

item.title: Probably may of been suggested before: Linux Award?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“frank_, post:16, topic:200948”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=265564.msg2197707#msg2197707 date=1208585457]

Obviously it would be a Tux award. I can’t believe I had to write that.

I’m sure most people realised that. The IRC services bot in the channel is currently Tux as well.
[/quote]who cares what the bot is called

the reason you had to type that, javac, is because the linux forum is full of ignorant fanboys

how about an award for IQ above room temperature, or an award for passing puberty, etc etc etc[/quote]
I’d pass for the first and second…

Read full topic
